item.description: This is our first meeting in the new location. A few minutes of introductions and then a presentation by JJ Rohrer. He is the founder of Elegant Technologies publisher of 11 (at last count!) iPhone and Mac applications. His presentation will be something along the lines of "Selling on the App Store: My experience so far." For those who want to sell on the App Store this should be an excellent chance to talk to someone with a good deal of experience. Hope you can make it.
item.how_to_find_us: In the Meeting Room on the lower level
item.name: Northwest iPhone Developers Meetup
